amendment.description: Amendment increases the established formula for allocations to local areas from 80 to 85 percent and decreases the discretionary formula from 20 percent to 15 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 108-92 to increase the amounts that are required according to the formulas established under section 132(b)(2)(B) from 80 to 85 percent and reduces the discretionary amounts from 20 to 15 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
